Demise for life from John de Wol- laton and william de Beston, of Nottingham, to Isabella who was the wife of Robert de ..... of Nottingham, of a grange in the messuage which william Cotiller formerly held in ‘le . . . . ate,' with remainder to the said william de Beston. XVitnesses: John ..... Mayor, Richard atte Chanons and Robert Bakester, Bailiffs, John Bakester, William Cotiller. [Mutilatcaz] 4415.

CXCVI.—1379, November 25. Release by John, son of Ralph de &Vollaton5 of Nottingham, and Margery his wife, to william de Beston, ‘Burgeys de Notyngham,' of a rent of ten shillings from a place near ‘the Mothall' de Notyngham,’1 towards the south, which Alice de Retford formerly held. [In [Vorman-Frencll] 4416.

XVitnesses: Richard

Hannesone‚ Mayor, Henry de Plumptre and Henry de Normanton, Bailiffs, Richard de Bradmer'‚ william Denet, John Clerk. 4420.
